General.name: help
General.desc: DMs the author the help page

General.name: get
General.desc: Sends a page with details about a clan

General.name: list
General.desc: A list of all clans in a server

General.name: join
General.desc: Joins a clan if it's public

General.name: invite
General.desc: Invites a user to a clan

Management.name: set
Management.desc: Sets an attribute in a clan

Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.desc: Bans a user from a clan

Moderation.name: unban
Moderation.desc: Unbans a user from a clan

Moderation.name: kick
Moderation.desc: Kicks a user from a clan

Economy.name: withdraw
Economy.desc: Removes pearls from a clan YOU OWN

Economy.name: slots
Economy.desc: A slot machine that can multiply your bet by up to 10x

Administrator.name: export
Administrator.desc: Sends a JSON file with all clans in a server

Administrator.name: import
Administrator.desc: Replaces all clans in a server with those from a JSON file

Administrator.name: unlisted
Administrator.desc: Gets a list of all unlisted clans

Administrator.name: forceset
Administrator.desc: Sets a thing in a clan by force

Administrator.name: forceshout
Administrator.desc: Sets a clan shout by force

Administrator.name: forcejoin
Administrator.desc: Joins a clan even if it's private
